isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM AXLES: SPICER J400-S, W460-S - DESCRIPTION

svcsubsecinfo.para: The Spicer tandem rear axle assemblies consist of two heavy duty, hypoid, single reduction carrier assemblies. The forward axle contains an integral power divider and inter-axle differential.

The power divider does exactly what its name implies, divides power between the forward rear and rear rear axle assemblies. The forward axle receives power via a set of helical gears within the power divider.
The rear rear axle receives power via a thru shaft. The inter-axle differential divides that power.
The complete forward axle carrier assembly and power divider can be removed from the axle housing as a unit.

The power divider and inter-axle differential can also be removed from the forward axle without disturbing the carrier assembly. This saves valuable time if service to the power divider is all that is required.
